name: Infantry Mine
Lore: 'Deadly explosive typically planted on the perimeter of strategic sites or high-security installations to prevent Rebel spies and saboteurs from gaining access.',
Text: 'Deploy at same exterior site as your mining droid. ''Explodes'' if a character deploys or moves (without using a vehicle or starfighter) to or across same site. Draw destiny. Character lost if destiny +2 > ability. Infantry Mine is also lost.',
